docs.snippet: Recent commercial real estate transactions in New York.

docs.abstract: Everyone from pro photographers to amateur shutterbugs is using phones to shoot video projects. Here’s how you can get started.
docs.snippet: Everyone from pro photographers to amateur shutterbugs is using phones to shoot video projects. Here’s how you can get started.
docs.lead_paragraph: Not long ago, a filmmaker wouldn’t dream of shooting a movie on a phone because the quality was so inferior to what you could capture on pricier devices. But that’s changing. Consider this: The most recent project from the renowned American film director Steven Soderbergh, “Unsane,” was shot entirely on an iPhone.

headline.main: A Beginner’s Guide to Taking Great Video on Your Phone
headline.print_headline: A Beginner’s Guide to Taking Great Video on Your Phone

docs.abstract: A gathering in New York this week for Consensus 2018, a blockchain-themed event, had all of the trappings of a modern business conference — a sign that the once-fringe world is increasingly going mainstream.
docs.snippet: A gathering in New York this week for Consensus 2018, a blockchain-themed event, had all of the trappings of a modern business conference — a sign that the once-fringe world is increasingly going mainstream.
docs.lead_paragraph: Seth Kaye has hot pink hair and Pokémon stuffed animals on his shoulder. He mines Litecoin, a cryptocurrency. He’s a designer. And he is trying to start a solar farm in Washington where he lives.

headline.main: When Thousands Filled a Hilton Ballroom to Ponder the Future of Bitcoin
headline.print_headline: Conventional Talk: The Future of Bitcoin

docs.abstract: Your computer most likely includes free tools for creating or printing stripped-down versions of web articles without ads, videos or other distractions.
docs.snippet: Your computer most likely includes free tools for creating or printing stripped-down versions of web articles without ads, videos or other distractions.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Without having to cut and paste text, is there an easy way to make a PDF file from the text of an online article — without the advertisements — so I can read it offline or print it more easily from my computer?

docs.abstract: Newer versions of Google’s browser include a setting to easily mute web pages that would otherwise open with audio blaring.
docs.snippet: Newer versions of Google’s browser include a setting to easily mute web pages that would otherwise open with audio blaring.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Does Google Chrome on the computer have any controls like Safari for stopping ads and videos that start automatically? Preferably, without having to install a browser extension or some other program that wants permission to look at my surfing.

headline.main: How to Shut Up Noisy Sites in Chrome

docs.abstract: In this week’s tech newsletter, Kevin Roose discusses the fraud charges against Theranos, the smoke-and-mirrors biotech company.
docs.snippet: In this week’s tech newsletter, Kevin Roose discusses the fraud charges against Theranos, the smoke-and-mirrors biotech company.
docs.lead_paragraph: Each week, Kevin Roose, technology columnist at The New York Times, discusses developments in the tech industry, offering analysis and maybe a joke or two.

headline.main: Kevin’s Week in Tech: Theranos, Fraud and the Failure to Fail
headline.print_headline: The Prideful Seeds  Of Theranos’s Undoing

docs.abstract: If you find that your Mac’s top menu is cluttered with icons you never use, you can clean things up.
docs.snippet: If you find that your Mac’s top menu is cluttered with icons you never use, you can clean things up.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. The top menu bar of my Mac has become cluttered with these little icons that I rarely use and are more distracting than anything. Is there a way to turn them off?

headline.main: Taking Items Off the Mac’s Menu

docs.abstract: Keeping malware out of app stores is a constant fight, but Google has stepped up its efforts in the past year.
docs.snippet: Keeping malware out of app stores is a constant fight, but Google has stepped up its efforts in the past year.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Can rogue Google app developers still sneak malware onto people’s devices with Android app updates once the app has been initially approved as “safe”?

docs.abstract: If you don’t want your phone’s calendar to change time zones when you travel, you can lock down your appointments.
docs.snippet: If you don’t want your phone’s calendar to change time zones when you travel, you can lock down your appointments.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. When I travel, how do I make my iPhone’s calendar stop moving the business appointments I originally made at home to the time zone of the city I’m in? I want my phone to act like a paper calendar where an appointment written down for 11 a.m. stays at 11 a.m., no matter where I happen to be.

docs.abstract: Apple’s computers are usually less receptive to malicious software, but extra protection can provide more security on several levels.
docs.snippet: Apple’s computers are usually less receptive to malicious software, but extra protection can provide more security on several levels.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. What is the best antivirus software for a Mac laptop?
